item.title: Mezzio Example: Psalm Introduction
item.author: /contact (Marc Guyer)
item.description: What is Psalm? Psalm is a static analysis tool for PHP that helps you identify problems with your code. If you use it, you’ll become a better coder. I promise. Learn more about Psalm Here’s a great read – the story of the origins of Psalm at Vimeo and the value it provided the team. https://psalm.dev/articles/fixing-code-that-aint-broken In this post, I’ll show a basic setup for static analysis with Psalm in Mezzio applications.
